title: jgonzi
author: jgonzi
content: Meanwhile HiveOS don't add the algo Nexa in lolMiner, here is a guide to mine it:https://github.com/Lolliedieb/lolMiner-releases/wiki/Guide-lolMiner-1.66---Nexa---HiveOSÂ Custom URL : https://github.com/Lolliedieb/lolMiner-releases/releases/download/1.66/lolminer-1.66.NEXAHiveOS.tar.gz

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: https://t.me/koliamainer/8662Today lolminer is the best miner for the NEXA coin.Unfortunately, only Nvidia, AMD video cards are not supported yet.lolMiner 1.64: Fastest Kaspa miner in markethttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4724735.0RIGEL 1.3.1 VS LOLMINER 1.66 NEXA coinhttps://t.me/koliamainer/8665Rigel 1.3.1 vs Lolminer 1.66 on RTX 2060 Super 8 Gb video cardshttps://t.me/koliamainer/8666

comments.author: ccplz
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on January 27, 2023, 10:33:55 AMany idea what core offset that guy is using to get these speeds on 3060?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ccplz on January 28, 2023, 02:57:08 AMQuote from: FP91G on January 27, 2023, 10:33:55 AMany idea what core offset that guy is using to get these speeds on 3060?try these settings. As the core frequency increases, power consumption increases greatly.https://www.hashrate.no/gpus/3060/NEXAWatch this video about overclocking video cards. Timecode 08:56 overclocking on video cards Nexahttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=onAZf8GCJdoAt 10 minutes of the video, there are very good settings for the low power consumption mode. If you have expensive electricity, then this is a good option.

comments.author: ccplz
comments.created_time: January 28, 2023, 02:27:41 PMLast edit: January 28, 2023, 11:16:46 PM by ccplz
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on January 28, 2023, 11:56:35 AMQuote from: ccplz on January 28, 2023, 02:57:08 AMQuote from: FP91G on January 27, 2023, 10:33:55 AMany idea what core offset that guy is using to get these speeds on 3060?try these settings. As the core frequency increases, power consumption increases greatly.https://www.hashrate.no/gpus/3060/NEXAWatch this video about overclocking video cards. Timecode 08:56 overclocking on video cards Nexahttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=onAZf8GCJdoAt 10 minutes of the video, there are very good settings for the low power consumption mode. If you have expensive electricity, then this is a good option.weird, I'm using --coff 255 --cclk 1470 --mclk 5000 --pl 150 as indicated on the site, yet one 3060 is showing 100w, the other 92w at hiveos. I doubt silicon lottery can cause such a big difference...edit: fixed by updating nvidia drivers

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: NEXA has a web wallethttps://wallet.nexaclub.org/This wallet uses a 12 word seed phrasePlease note: This wallet is not affiliated with Bitcoin Unlimited and is the work of a community developer. All code is public, https://gitlab.com/vgrunner/nexa-wallet/-/tree/master/wallet-appbut as always, use caution as Nexa/BU is not responsible for any losses. For all wallet inquiries, please contact @Runner on discord.https://t.me/Info4atlanin/8687

comments.author: styleshifter
comments.body: Does lolMiner support mining Nexa on Intel GPUs?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: styleshifter on February 01, 2023, 10:09:12 AMDoes lolMiner support mining Nexa on Intel GPUs?So far, the miners are optimized only for Nvidia video cards. If there are no miners for AMD video cards, then the profit is very small. There are very few Intel GPUs in mining, and they are all unprofitable right now, so ominized miners will be the last to appear if Intel does not start to change the situation.
